title: Overextends in lane and dies to 1v1 Trynd as Voli-
body:
Abuses me for trying to cleanup and losing by 100HP.
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/54823118.jpg

replies.body: Telling someone to kill themselves is a pretty flog thing to say to someone, regardless of what was said or done.
No it's not, because they were abusive.

Abused people lash out and abused people recede.

Riot is forcing us to recede which is forcing us into b-tch mentality plus we are being b-tches by trying to retaliate through them, further encouraging b-tch mentality.

B-tch mentality is not a good thing because all it does is encourage camouflaged abuse and there is nothing you can do about sub-radar abuse and sub-radar conflict.
